verses.verse: This was the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> for he was the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%> As for <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> because he was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> therefore he had <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

So this was for the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H44>Abiezer,<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2507>Helek,<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H844>Asriel,<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7928>Shechem,<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8061>Shemida:<s%> these were the <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

But <S%H6765>Zelophehad,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> had no <S%H1121>sons,<s%> but <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> and these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> <S%H4244>Mahlah,<s%> <S%H5270>Noah,<s%> <S%H2295>Hoglah,<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> and <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

They came <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>princes,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> our <S%H251>brothers.<s%>" Therefore according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H251>brothers<s%> of their <S%H1>father.<s%>

<S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H2256>parts<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> besides the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> which is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%>

because the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H5157>had<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H1121>sons.<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> belonged to the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was from <S%H836>Asher<s%> to <S%H4366>Michmethath,<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H1980>along<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of En <S%H5887>Tappuah.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> belonged to <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> but <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> on the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> belonged to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H7071>Kanah,<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook.<s%> These <S%H5892>cities<s%> belonged to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was on the north <S%H6828>side<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook,<s%> and <S%H8444>ended<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H5045>Southward<s%> it was <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>'s, and <S%H6828>northward<s%> it was <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>'s, and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> was his <S%H1366>border.<s%> They <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H836>Asher<s%> on the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and to <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> on the <S%H4217>east.<s%>

<S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5316>heights<s%> in <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> in <S%H836>Asher<s%> Beth <S%H1052>Shean<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and <S%H2991>Ibleam<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5874>Endor<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns.<s%>

Yet the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the inhabitants of those <S%H5892>cities;<s%> but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H2974>would<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in that <S%H776>land.<s%>

It <S%H1121>happened,<s%> when the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had grown <S%H2388>strong,<s%> that they <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> to forced <S%H4522>labor,<s%> and <S%H3423>didn't<s%> utterly drive them <S%H3423>out.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Why have you <S%H5414>given<s%> me just <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2256>part<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> since I am a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5704>because<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me so <S%H3541>far?<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7227>them,<s%> "If you are a great <S%H5971>people,<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> and <S%H1254>clear<s%> land for yourself there in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%> and of the <S%H7497>Rephaim;<s%> since the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is too narrow for <S%H213>you.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H2022>hill<s%> country is not <S%H4672>enough<s%> for <S%H3669>us.<s%> All the Canaanites who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> have <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> both those who are in Beth <S%H1052>Shean<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and those who are in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> even to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and to <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You are a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and have <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H3581>power.<s%> You shall not have <S%H259>one<s%> lot <S%H1486>only;<s%>

but the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country shall be <S%H3293>yours.<s%> Although it is a forest, you shall cut it <S%H1254>down,<s%> and <S%H8444>it<s%>'s farthest extent shall be <S%H3423>yours;<s%> for you shall drive out the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> though they have <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and though they are <S%H2389>strong.<s%>"
